advisory.name: RLBA-2021:1701
advisory.synopsis: mokutil bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for mokutil is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: mokutil needs to be updated to retrieve th secure  boot key from the kernel
